#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: Tee.

= Description =

The Tee element describe a individual Tee on a golf course.

= Attributes =

The element has the following attributes:

 # number - Tee number to properly sequence Tee in a Tees structure.

= Elements = 

== Descriptive Elements ==

The element has the following descriptive elements:

 # length
 # handicap
 # par


== Structural Elements ==

None.
